Quick Start Guide
=================

After completing the installation process, you can quickly get started with the project by following these steps:

Access the Admin Interface
--------------------------

- Access the admin interface by visiting ``/admin`` in your web browser. Here, you can create, modify, or delete lettings and profiles as needed.

View Lettings and Profiles
--------------------------

- To view the listings of lettings, navigate to ``/lettings/``.
- For profiles, visit ``/profiles/``.

Each of these steps allows you to interact with the different aspects of the application, ensuring you can manage and view data efficiently.
